scenes.description: Gawr Gura performs the song 'Ash Again' on a lit 3D stage with dynamic water and light effects.
MC section. Gawr Gura addresses the audience, reflecting on her five years as an idol and her growth within Hololive.

subtitles.original: Hi, hello, hello hello thank you hello
subtitles.english: Hi, hello, hello hello thank you hello

subtitles.original: Hi, um, from the very bottom of my shark heart,
subtitles.english: Hi, um, from the very bottom of my shark heart,

subtitles.original: thank you.
subtitles.english: thank you.

subtitles.original: Um, if I could borrow your ear
subtitles.english: Um, if I could borrow your ear

subtitles.original: for just a... just a bit more time,
subtitles.english: for just a... just a bit more time,

subtitles.original: I want to thank you, um, again.
subtitles.english: I want to thank you, um, again.

subtitles.original: Thank you for letting me be your shark idol
subtitles.english: Thank you for letting me be your shark idol

subtitles.original: for the last half a decade.
subtitles.english: for the last half a decade.

subtitles.original: Five years, wow. Just about five years or so.
subtitles.english: Five years, wow. Just about five years or so.

subtitles.original: Um, in this time, I... I...
subtitles.english: Um, in this time, I... I...

subtitles.original: I have loved performing for you...
subtitles.english: I have loved performing for you...

subtitles.original: ...here or on stage or in my bedroom,
subtitles.english: ...here or on stage or in my bedroom,

subtitles.original: any... anywhere really.
subtitles.english: any... anywhere really.

subtitles.original: Um, I... yeah, wow.
subtitles.english: Um, I... yeah, wow.

subtitles.original: Speaking... speaking of half a decade,
subtitles.english: Speaking... speaking of half a decade,

subtitles.original: when I first joined Hololive,
subtitles.english: when I first joined Hololive,

subtitles.original: I had barely any experience in streaming
subtitles.english: I had barely any experience in streaming

subtitles.original: or dancing or singing in front of people.
subtitles.english: or dancing or singing in front of people.

subtitles.original: I couldn't even sing in front of my own mother.
subtitles.english: I couldn't even sing in front of my own mother.

subtitles.original: Um, but... but now, now look at me, right?
subtitles.english: Um, but... but now, now look at me, right?

subtitles.original: Um, I won't lie, it was really hard to get my footing.
subtitles.english: Um, I won't lie, it was really hard to get my footing.

subtitles.original: Um, sometimes it was terrifying.
subtitles.english: Um, sometimes it was terrifying.

subtitles.original: No, a lot of the time it was terrifying.
subtitles.english: No, a lot of the time it was terrifying.

subtitles.original: But spending time with you and all of the
subtitles.english: But spending time with you and all of the

subtitles.original: incredibly talented members Hololive has
subtitles.english: incredibly talented members Hololive has

subtitles.original: been an absolute pleasure...
subtitles.english: been an absolute pleasure...

subtitles.original: ...and I can truly say, a highlight in my life.
subtitles.english: ...and I can truly say, a highlight in my life.

subtitles.original: I will never forget my time here at Hololive.
subtitles.english: I will never forget my time here at Hololive.

subtitles.original: I... I feel like I've been able to grow a lot
subtitles.english: I... I feel like I've been able to grow a lot

subtitles.original: in these past years.
subtitles.english: in these past years.

subtitles.original: Not in height or brain activity, but...
subtitles.english: Not in height or brain activity, but...
